ygData.subject: Re: Psalm of Warmth
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m going to keep flogging eqss.stratics.com/spells until people acknowledge it. :) From stratics: Psalm of Warmth Damage shield -1 Cold resist 10
ygData.messageBody:
kim@... wrote:

> From: <kim@...>
>
> I forget, does it give you an AC bonus as well?

I'm going to keep flogging eqss.stratics.com/spells until people acknowledge it. :)

From stratics:

Psalm of Warmth
Damage shield -1
Cold resist 10
Infravision 1
Defense 5

So yes, it does provide an AC bonus. I don't know if it's an AC bonus of 5 or not, since the damage
shield is certainly more than -1 and the cold resist is more than 10. Bard songs have puzzling numbers in
the database, but the database is always right when it comes to whether a song has an effect or not.

Jyzan
